fieldInfo.personName: Use this field when you are wanting to have fields for Salutation, First, Middle, Last name
fieldInfo.password: Password field. Displays as (****), but is readable in the api return.
fieldInfo.colorpicker: Allows you to store a specific color. Ex: #1174BA
fieldInfo.email: This is a Beta Feature. Email Address is not part of the default emailAddress.
fieldInfo.phone: This is a Beta Feature. Phone Humber is not part of the default phoneNumber.
